name: CityofPeachtreeCornersNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable this skill to stay informed about news and events happening in the City of Peachtree Corners, Georgia. Once you have enabled the skill, be sure to go to "Settings" and then "Flash Briefing" in your Alexa app and turn on the skill. Then simply say "Alexa, play my Flash Briefing." or "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" to hear the latest news and events from the City of Peachtree Corners.

- To invoke the skill, say "Alexa, play my Flash Briefing" or "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?"
- To skip to the next news item, say "Alexa, go forward."
- To go back to the previous news item, say "Alexa, go back."
- To pause or stop say "Alexa, stop."
- To restart, say "Alexa, start."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
